chapter.text: 15|1|allipeu lam la igeos-eun seongseouimalsseum-eulo jinlileul balghyeojuneun kkulan-ila
15|2|amado mid-eum-i eobsneun jadeul-eun geu jasindeul-i iljjigi museullim-i doe eoss-eul geos-eul hago wonhal ttaega olila
15|3|geudeul-i meoggo insaeng-eul hyanglaghayeogeudeul-ui somang-i geudeul-eul gippeudolog dula geudeul-i god alge doelila
15|4|imi jeonghayeojin gyeyul-i ileujianihan minjog-eul hananim-i myeolmangke haji ani haess-eumyeo
15|5|eoneu minjogdo geudeul-ui unmyeong-eul seoduleugeona jiyeonsikil su eobsnola
15|6|ittae geudeul-i malhadeola geudae ege kkulan-i gyesidoeeossdani geudaegamichinjaga aninyo
15|7|geudaega jinsilhan ja jung-e issda myeon wae cheonsadeul-eul ileuge haji anhneunyo lago hani
15|8|hananim-eun jinliui mogjeog-eul wihayeo cheonsadeul-eul bonaess-eul ppun-ila man-il cheonsadeul-i geudeul-ege wassdamyeon geudeul-eun-yuyedoeji moshaess-eulila
15|9|hananim-i sillo geu mesejileul gyesihaess-euni hananim-i geugeos-eul bohohalila
15|10|geudae ijeon chogi minjog-egedohananim-eun seonjijadeul-eul bonaess-euna
15|11|seonjijaga geudeul-ege ileumyeon geudeul-eun oheolyeo geuleul jolonghayeossdeo la
15|12|hananim-eun geugeos-i joeindeul-ui ma-eumsog-e deuldolog hayeoss-euna
15|13|geudeul-eun geudeul seonjodeul-i myeolmanghan seonlyega iss-eum-edo geugeos-eul midji anhdeola
15|14|hananim-i geudeul-ege haneul-ui mun-eul yeol-eo geudeul-i geugos-eul hyanghayeo oleuge handa hayeodo
15|15|geudeul-eun teullim-eobs-i uliui nundeul-i dochwidoeeo uliga masul-e geol lyeo iss-eul ppun-ilago malhal geos-ila
15|16|geulihayeo hananim-eun haneul-e cheondoleul mandeulgo boneun jadeul-eul wihae geugeos-eul jangsighayeoss-eumyeo
15|17|hananim-eun geugeos-eul jeojubad-eun satan-eulobuteo bohohayeossnola
15|18|geuleona mollae deudneunjaneun taoleuneun seonmyeonghan bulkkoch-eul ttaleum-ila
15|19|hananim-eun daejileul pyeolchyeo geuan-e sandeul-eul sewo gojeongsikigo modeun geos-i geuan-eseo gyunhyeongdoege saengsanke ham-ila
15|20|hananim-eun neohuideul-eul wihayeo neohuiga saengseongke haji moshaneun il-yong hal yangsig-eul geuan-e buyeohayeossnola
15|21|hananim-egeneun modeun il-yonghal yangsig-i iss-eudoe pil-yohan yang oeeneun naelyeojuji ani hasinila
15|22|hananim-eun biguleum-eul bonaeeo haneullobuteo bileul naelige hasa geu geos-eulo neohuileul chungjogsikina neohuineungeugeos-eul jeojanghaji moshamyeo
15|23|sillo saengmyeong-eul buyeohago saengmyeong eul as-aganeun geosdo hananimkke issna ni modeun geos-i hananim-ege sangsogdoem ila
15|24|hananim-eun neohui gaunde apseo on jawa dwie on jaleul algo gyesi nila
15|25|junimkkeseo geudeul moduleul moi ge hasini sillo geubun-eun gwonneung-gwa asim-eulo chungmanhasim-ila
15|26|hananim-i ingan-eul changjohasa geomgo mulg-eun jinheulg-eulo mandeusyeossnola
15|27|hananim-i tto yeongmaleul changjoha sa geugeos-eun tteugeoun sal-in-ui bul-eul changjohagi ijeon-ila
15|28|bola junim-i cheonsadeul-ege naega geomgo mulg-eun heulg-eulo ingan-eul changjohalila malsseum-i iss-eossnola
15|29|naega hyeongsang-eul mandeul-eo geuan-e naui yeonghon-eul bul-eoneoh-eul ttae neohuiga geuege bubog halahani
15|30|cheonsadeul moduga buboghadeola
15|31|geuleona ibeulliseuneun buboghaneun jajung-e issgileul geojeolhayeossdeola
15|32|hananim-i ileusigil ibeulliseu yeo nega buboghaneun jajung-e issji anh neun iyuneun mueos-inyo lago mul-euni
15|33|ibeulliseuga malhagil dangsinkkeseo mulg-go geom-eun jinheulg-eulo bich-eun ingan-e ge wae naega buboghayeoya habnikka la go daedabhadeola
15|34|geulihayeo hananim-eun myeonglyeonghasyeoss nani geugos eulobuteo nagala neoneun jeojubad-assnola
15|35|simpan-ui geunalkkaji neoege jeo juga iss-eulila
15|36|ittae ibeulliseuga juyeo buhwal-uigeunalkkaji jeoleul yuyehayeo jusoseo
15|37|hananim-i ileusigil nega yu yedoeneunja gaunde iss-eudoe
15|38|jijeongdoen geu sigan geunal kkajila hasini
15|39|ibeulliseu malhayeossdeola juyeo dangsin-i naleul banghwangtolog hayeossgie jisang-eseo naega geudeul-eul yuhoghayeo geudeul moduleul banghwangke haliyo
15|40|geuleona dangsin-ui jinsilhan jongbog deul-eun je-oedoem-ila hamae
15|41|hananim-i ileusigil naui seong silhan jungbog-i ganeun gil-i naegelo i leuneun olbaleun gil-ila
15|42|sillo neo satan-eun talseonhayeo neo leul ttaleuneun ja oeeneun naui jong eoneunugudo jibae hal su eobsnola
15|43|sillo jiog-eun geudeul moduleul wihan yagsogdoen gos-eulo
15|44|geugos-eneun ilgobgaeui mun-i iss eumyeo geugeos-eun geudeul joeindeul-e baedang doen gaggag-ui mun-ila
15|45|geuleona sillo jeong-uilobge saneun janeun umul-i issneun cheongug-eulo
15|46|pyeong-anhago anjeonhage geugos-e deulgehayeo
15|47|hananim-i geudeul ma-eumsog-e issneunjeung-oleul jegeohalini geudeul-eun hyeongje cheoleom eolgulgwa eolgul-eul maju daehadeola
15|48|geuan-eseo pigonham-i geudeul-eul eomseubhaji anihamyeo ttohan geudeul-eun gyeolko geugos-eulobuteo chubangdoeji anhnola
15|49|naui jungbog-ege illeogalodoe sillo naega gwan-yong-gwa eunhyelo chungmanham ila
15|50|geuleona naui beol-eun gotongseuleo un beol-ila
15|51|abeulaham-ui sonnimdeul-e gwanha yeo geudeul-ege illeojula
15|52|ittae cheonsadeul-i geuege deul-eo ga pyeong-anhasoseo lago insahani sil lo ulineun dangsindeul-i duleobnaida lago abeulaham-i daedabhadeola
15|53|ie cheonsadeul-i malhadeola du lyeowo haji malla ulineun chongmyeonghan jihyeleul gajin sanaeaiui sosig-eul dang sinkke jeonhalyeo wassnaida
15|54|abeulaham-i malhayeossdeola naideul-eun jeoege sanae aiui sosig-eul jeonhalyeo osyeossdani geu bog-eum-i mueos ibnikka lago mul-eumae
15|55|uliga jinsillo dangsinkke jinli ui bog-eum-eul jeonhayeoss-euni silmanghaneun jajung-e issji malla
15|56|abeulaham-i daedabhadeola banghwanghaneunja oeeneun nuga junim-ui eunhye leul silmangsikiliyo
15|57|cheonsadeul-iyeo dangsindeul-ui samyeong-imueos-inyo lago mul-euni
15|58|joejieun los-ui baegseong-ege jeohui leul bonaesyeossseubnida lago cheonsadeul-i daedabhadeola
15|59|geuleona los-ui gajog-eul je-oeha go ulineun geudeul moduleul gujehali yo
15|60|geuleona los-ui anaeneun guje doelsu eobs-eumae geunyeoneun beol-eul badge doe lila
15|61|sajadeul-i losgwa geuui chujongja deul-ege ileuleoss-eulttae
15|62|lus-i naega alji moshaneun dangsindeul-eun nugu-inyo lago malhani
15|63|ulineun sajalosseo baegseongdeul-i uisimhaneun geos-eul wanseonghagoja dangsin kke wassnaida
15|64|ulineun jinlilo dangsinkke ileu leoss-eumae uliga malham-i jinlila
15|65|geuleomeulo dangsin gajoggwa hamkke bamjung-e tteonala geuligo geudeul dwileul ttaleudoe neohui gaunde eoneu nugudo dwidol-aboji malla neohuiga myeonglyeongbad-eungeugos-eulo tteonala
15|66|geuligo achim-i doel ttae joeindeulmoduege eunhyega danjeoldoelilaneun sosig-eul geuege jeonhayeossdeoni
15|67|geu dosiui baegseongdeul-i gippeoha myeo seodulleo odeola
15|68|ittae los-i malhagil ibundeul-eun naui sonnimdeul-ini na-ege yogdoeji anhge hayeo jusigo
15|69|hananim-eul gyeong-oehayeo naleul bu kkeuleobge hajimasoseo lago malhani
15|70|geudeul-i malhagil uliga dangsin kke jeomada-ege malhaneun geos-eul geumha ji anihayeossso
15|71|los-i malhagil neohuiga wonhanda myeon gyeolhonhal naui ttaldeul-i issnola
15|72|maengsehageondae sillo geudeul-eun geudeul-ui bulsin-e dochwidoeeo banghwanghago issnola
15|73|geuleona pogpung-eun dongteugi jigjeongeudeul-eul myeolmangsikyeossdeola
15|74|geuleohgehayeo hananim-eun geu dosileul dwieop-eossgo yeol-e dalgueojin dol bileul geudeul-ege naelyeoss-euni
15|75|sillo geu an-eneun ihaehaneun jadeul-eul wihan yejeung-eulo
15|76|geu dosineun ajig jiwojiji anhneun gil-wie issnola
15|77|sillo geuan-eneun midneun jadeul-eul wihan yejeungdo iss-eudoe
15|78|sillo geugos-ui baegseongdeul-eun joein deul-iyeossnola
15|79|geulaeseo hananim-i geudeul-ege beol-eul naelimae geu du go-eul-i myeolmang han heunjeog-i ajigdo gil-wie issdeola
15|80|hijeuleu baegseongdeuldo yeeonjadeul eul bulsinhayeoss-euni
15|81|hananim-i geudeul-ege yejeung-eul bonaess-euna geudeul-eun geue gwanhayeo bul sinhamyeo
15|82|geu san-e jib-eul sewi hananim-uibeol-eul pihago anjeonhage sallyeogo ha yeoss-euna
15|83|haneul-ui cheonbeol-i achim jigjeon-e geudeul-eul myeolmangke hayeoss-euni
15|84|geudeul-i eod-eossdeon modeun geos-i geudeul-ege yuyongchi moshayeossdeola
15|85|hananim-i haneulgwa daejiwa geu saiui modeun geos-eul jinlilo changjoha yeossgo ttohan simpan-ui nal-i olgeos-ila geuleomeulo geudaeneun geudeul-ege neogeu leobgo gwandaehala
15|86|sillo geudaeui junim-eun changjoju isa asineun bun-isila
15|87|hananim-eun geudaeege jaju nang songhaneun ilgobjeolgwa widaehan kkulan-eul jueossnola

15|88|hananim-i ilbu bulsinjadeullohayeo hyanglag-eul gajdolog han geos-e geudaeneunnun-eul keuge tteuji malmyeo geudeul-ui bul sin-eulo seulpeohaji malgo midneunjadeul-eul-wihae geudaeui nalgaeleul najchula
15|89|illeogalodoe sillo naega bunmyeong han gyeong-gojaila
15|90|bubun-eulo bunlihan baegseongdeul-egegyesihaessdeus-i geudaeege kkulan-eul gyesihaess-eudoe
15|91|kkulan-eul bubun-eulo bunlihan bul sinjadeul-i iss-eoss-eumeulo
15|92|geudae junim-ui ileum-eulo hana nim-eun geudeul moduege jilmunhasinila
15|93|geudeul-i haenghadeon modeun geos-e gwanhan geos-ila
15|94|geuleomeulo geudaega myeonglyeongbad-eun geos-eul seon-eonhadoe bulsinjadeullobuteo meollihala
15|95|hananim-eun jolonghaneun jadeullobuteo geudaeleul bohoham-e chungmanham-ila
15|96|hananimkke daleun sin-eul biyuha neun ja geudeul-eun god alge doelila
15|97|geudeul-i geojishaneun geos-eulo geu daeui ma-eum-i geunsimdoem-eul algo issna ni
15|98|geuleona geudaeui junim-eul chanmi hago eopdeulyeo buboghaneun ja jung-e iss-eula
15|99|geudaeui junim-eul gyeongbaehala hwag silhan geunal-i geudaeege olila
